items.sentence: Tom managed to sleep a few hours on the plane.
Tom isn't going to leave Mary here by herself.
Tom isn't going to find what he's looking for.
Tom isn't a friend. He's just an acquaintance.
Tom is very concerned about what might happen.
Tom is trying to find out what he needs to do.
Tom is still not sure why he needs to do that.
Tom is sitting in the shade of the apple tree.
Tom is one of the most generous people I know.
Tom is more scared of you than you are of him.
Tom is lucky Mary is here to help him do that.
Tom is looking for a way to solve the problem.
Tom is going to have a goodbye party for Mary.
Tom is going to build a wall around his house.
Tom is going to be here for a couple of hours.
Tom is going to be the next person to do that.
Tom is going to be present at today's meeting.
Tom is going to be late for work this morning.
Tom is going to be busy most of the afternoon.
Tom is going to ask Mary to do that, isn't he?
